stories.text:
I'm thinking about what I've done over my career and wondering if I should have taken more chances and built alternative sources of income.

In our industry it seems we could but how many do?

Have you? If so what is bringing in your side income?
stories.title: Ask HN: Do you have multiple income streams?

stories.text:
Would you watch Elon Musk's face + laptop screen while he works? Bella Poarch's screen+ face as she watches tiktoks in her room? Your best friend shop online for clothes?

Why? What are you curious about?
stories.title: Would you watch your favorite influencer's private laptop/ phone screen+ face?
